item.title: Games I Want To Run
item.description:
Here’s a few game that I want run together with a pitch and some links for further reading.

Call Of Cthulhu - Gaslight Link to heading

[Crunch:Low/Medium] Victorian era London. Class divides are strong and discrimination is everywhere. Chuck in the horrors of Cthulhu to break down the hierarchy and everyones sanity.

Very simple to play but with lots of depth to dive into as well. You aren’t meant to defeat everything you see because sometimes it’s a god of unknownable horrors.
